page.title: 16MARSKE AREA - RELIGION
page.content: The area is well catered for when it come to Churches. There are two at Marske and one at Downholme. Anglicans worship weekly at St Edmunds, Marske and fortnightly at St Michaels, Downholme. At present there is not a resident Vicar in the area but it is expected that soon these two Churches will join with Richmond and Hudswell.The Methodist Church is situated at Clints. It is part of the Reeth circuit and services are held weekly by the Minister or a local preacher. At least twice a year Jehovahs Witnesses come into the area to talk to the local people.
